docinfo.docinfo:doc-heading: [453,300] Form 116 Notice of intended application for probate, administration or reseal

heading.title: [453,300] Form 116 Notice of intended application for probate, administration or reseal

leg:level-vrnt.toc-caption: [453,300] Form 116 Notice of intended application for probate, administration or reseal

leg:heading.title: Notice of intended application for probate, administration or reseal

text.link: Click here to access Microsoft® Word Document g453300.doc

p.text: (Notice of intended application for probate, administration or reseal)
Advertisement: Notice of intended application for [#Probate # Administration #Administration with the will annexed #resealing]
In the Supreme Court of New South Wales Equity Division Probate List.
After 14 days from publication of this notice
…an application for Probate of the will dated (date) #and codicil(s) dated (date) of (Name of Deceased) late of (Suburb) (State), will be made by (Names of applicant or applicants).
…an application for Administration of the estate of (Name of Deceased) late of (Suburb) (State), will be made by (Names of applicant or applicants) (if applicable relationship to the deceased).

bodytext.h: If application is for administration with the will annexed

p.text: …an application for Administration with the will annexed dated (date) of the estate of (Name of Deceased) late of (Suburb) (State), will be made by (Names of applicant or applicants).

text.emph: If application is for a reseal

p.text: …an application will be made that #probate of the will dated (date) #and codicil(s) dated (date) #administration with will annexed dated (date) # and codicils dated (date) of #administration of the estate of (Name of Deceased) late of (Suburb) (State/Country), made by the (name of other Court) be sealed with the seal of this court.
Creditors are required to send particulars of their claims upon this estate to (Name of applicant(s) or the solicitor of the applicant(s)), (Address) (#or by email to (email address).

#Additional information in relation to any restrictions or qualifications or any other relevant information in relation to the intended application; for example if application is being made under section 91 of the Succession Act 2006 only for the purposes of permitting an application for a family provision order or a notional estate order to be dealt with..
